channel.title: I need help on Devo V7
channel.description:
Hey, first off, I am not going to lie, I am a beginner coder, I just have a few questions.
1-(I know it sounds nooby but, How do you take duel off? Failure- Iv'e looked at and searched dueling, deleted it, still got problems. Can anyone please help because Im sick of looking for a help question with, (how to take out dupe) and either everyone rips the hell out of you, or just give no detail to solution.
2-( I need a self Explainatory of how to add specials. Sounds like a lot to ask but I will just say this, I BEG TO LEARN THIS).
Isn't this what master coders should do? Teach the Beginners? Thanks if you answer, I appreciate it. :| :| :|

item.title: I need help on Devo V7
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

About the dueling do you want it so they can’t ask to duel with you?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help on Devo V7
item.dc:creator: @x_thiever_x x thiever x
item.description:
@x_thiever_x wrote:

Alright, when I mean dupe, I mean Duel dupe, when the player accepts duel and they type ::players, close it, and they both get items. Or when they click report abuse button. I just want to know how to take duel off.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help on Devo V7

item.title: I need help on Devo V7
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

ok, first of all there are many different kinds of dupes so please be more specific. and secondly, there are tuts for adding weapon specials in the tutorials section.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help on Devo V7
item.dc:creator: @Nuggetdabest Nuggetdabest
item.description:
@Nuggetdabest wrote:

LOL!

[quote=“x thiever x, post:1, topic:317449”]Isn’t this what master coders should do? Teach the Beginners?
Thanks if you answer, I appreciate it. :|[/quote]
Yes they should! When you say “take duel off” you mean when you right click and it says: Trade,follow,duel etc? like rsc. Or Something entirely different?

Read full topic
